title: Brush of Rose Painting
description: This single page website it to help further the reach of this painting business that previously didn't have a website. This is another vue application that you can check the repo here

title: Matt's Shred Shack
description: Using gh-pages this singe page application is using Vue and a github redirect to point to a custom domain. This application is for Guitar Lessons with me!

title: FastM8
description: This is a fasting app I built in vue and is hosted on a raspberry pi! The backend which is located here is a node server that's a CRUD app that is hosted through cloudflare tunneling which you can check here.

title: PEPBinder
description: Ecommerce website to sell and market a Personal Estate Preparedness(PEP) Binder so as to organize last wishes and estate. Integrates with Stripe for payments,

title: Vincent Fult's Website
description: My buddy who is a guitar teacher quit his job at Sam Ash to pursue music and wanted to work for himself. I built him a website to help him gather students. The things is he's so popular that his rolodex wass filled nearly instantly! Luckily if he needs it this website will help organize future and current students.

title: Schabel Property Management Group
description: Tasked to upgrade an old site to a more modern mobile responsive site. Also updated the logo and created a graphic that can be used for their business card as well as colorizing a b&w photo to use as their main mast image. Here is the old version of the site versus the new site.

title: Silver Door Spa
description: Upgraded website from old php template to custom redesign. Source code can be found on my GitHub.

title: Free Code Camp Indy Meetup Website
description: Team leader of developers and designers for a local meetup group encouraging newbie developers to learn to code. Check out our design document!

title: MattAttaq.com
description: Starting 2015 in September mattattaq.com featured my comic works from college and beyond.

title: Github Repos
description: Here is where I have some of the templates that I've worked on for work. It also has this profolio website in one of the repos!

title: Developer Blog
description: Was inspired to document my experience in code so as to have a reference in the future.
